summary: An internal FBI email chain from August 12, 2019, forwarding a situation report (Sitrep) regarding the search of Jeffrey Epstein's property. The email notes the seizure of computers, storage devices, documents, and servers, but states nothing appears to be a 'smoking gun' at that time.

events.title: Search of Epstein Property
events.description: FBI agents conducted a search of Jeffrey Epstein's property, seizing several computers, storage devices, documents, and servers.

keyFacts: An FBI search of Jeffrey Epstein's property was conducted on or around August 12, 2019.
The search resulted in the seizure of several computers, storage devices, documents, and servers.
An initial assessment by an FBI agent stated that nothing seized appeared to be a 'smoking gun' type of evidence.
The email originated from the FBI New York Violent Crimes Task Force.
The communication highlights the ongoing investigative activities surrounding Epstein at that time.
